title: Please LOL Please!
body:
**Please LOL make more positive skins. 
I hate the fact you have demonized TEEMO by saying he is Evil. 
We all know he is cute and cuddly !! so please don't change that. 
The main reason I made this discussion is for all that want more POSITIVE skins, not to bring more happiness to the players, but to also attract a younger generation starting to play PC games. 
I think you should bring out a POSITIVE skin for Lulu, like puppy's instead of weird flying dragons ! for example. 
Zac could be made of jelly. 
**
PLEASE EVERYONE ! USE YOUR IMAGINATION AND REPLY TO THIS DISCUSSION, Lets bring the happiness back to LOL

replies.body:
M9 there are plenty of positive skins I can name plenty

* Dragon Tamer Lulu
* All teemo skins except the omega squad one
* Little Elf Tristana
* Definitely not Blitzcrank
A lot more, just those ones are the ones I can think of
